summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4704 for the improvement of West Othello Street from 12th Avenue Southwest to 16th Avenue Southwest, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing wooden curbs and gutters, and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54486, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
